item.title: ESPN Will Not Air Spike Lee’s Colin Kaepernick Docuseries Due to ‘Creative Differences’
item.description: ESPN will no longer air Spike Lee’s docuseries about former NFL quarterback Colin Kaepernick. “ESPN, Colin Kaepernick and Spike Lee have collectively decided to no longer proceed with this
